title: ChatGPT XRP Price Prediction: Why the AI Sees XRP at $3.50 Before Bitcoin Recovers
description: The latest ChatGPT XRP price prediction suggests the XRP price could reach $2.50 to $3.50 before Bitcoin fully recovers. XRP (CRYPTO: XRP) currently trades near $1.45, roughly 60% below its 2025 high of $3.65. Bitcoin sits around $65,000, more than 50% off its $126,000 peak. Both cryptos have fallen severely, but their recovery paths look ...
